EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Toronto 1 day reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Toronto. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Toronto Friday, May 20th 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/toronto?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-Toronto]]>
Location: Pivotal Labs <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/toronto]]> 1 Toronto Street, Suite 1100, 11th floor Toronto, Ontario M5C2V6 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/dir//1+Toronto+St+%231100,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada/@43.6499311,-79.375757,17z/data=!4m13!1m4!3m3!1s0x89d4cb323c288245:0x750b0662dc419953!2s1+Toronto+St+%231100,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada!3b1!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x89d4cb323c288245:0x750b0662dc419953!2m2!1d-79.375757!2d43.6499311]]>
Questions? Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <[[mailto:psantos@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
